mapper.select: SELECT COMM_CODE , COMD_CODE , COMDCD_NAME , SORT_ORDR , USE_YN , CODE_EXPN , REGP_ID , REG_DTM , MODP_ID , MOD_DTM FROM POLARBEAR.TB_COMCODXD WHERE COMM_CODE = #{COMM_CODE} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY SORT_ORDR

SELECT COMM_CODE , COMD_CODE , COMDCD_NAME , SORT_ORDR , USE_YN , CODE_EXPN , REGP_ID , REG_DTM , MODP_ID , MOD_DTM FROM POLARBEAR.TB_COMCODXD WHERE COMM_CODE = #{COMM_CODE} AND COMD_CODE = #{COMD_CODE} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY SORT_ORDR

/*현재 메뉴(SERVLETPATH를 기준으로 검색)*/ SELECT A.MENU_CD , A.MENU_NAME , MENU_URL , A.UPPER_MENU_CD , A.SORT_ORDR , A.MENU_GUBN , A.MENU_CSS , POLARBEAR.FC_GET_MENU_PATH(A.MENU_CD, 'CODE') AS MENU_CD_PATH , POLARBEAR.FC_GET_MENU_PATH(A.MENU_CD, 'NAME') AS MENU_NAME_PATH FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT LEVEL LVL, A.* FROM ( SELECT A.*, LENGTH(SUBSTR(MENU_URL, 1, DECODE(INSTR(MENU_URL, '?') - 1, -1, 10000, INSTR(MENU_URL, '?') - 1))) LEN FROM POLARBEAR.TB_SYSMNUXM A WHERE MENU_CD IN ( SELECT MENU_CD FROM POLARBEAR.TB_SYSGMNXM WHERE GROUP_CD IN (SELECT GROUP_CD FROM POLARBEAR.TB_SYSGUSXM WHERE MEMB_ID = #{MEMB_ID}) UNION SELECT MENU_CD FROM POLARBEAR.TB_SYSMNUXM GROUP BY MENU_CD ) ) A CONNECT BY PRIOR MENU_CD = UPPER_MENU_CD START WITH UPPER_MENU_CD IS NULL ) WHERE MENU_URL LIKE '%' || #{SERVLETPATH} || '%' ORDER BY LEN, LVL DESC, SORT_ORDR, MENU_CD ) A ) A WHERE RNUM = 1

SELECT LEVEL LVL , A.MENU_CD , A.MENU_NAME , MENU_URL , A.UPPER_MENU_CD , A.SORT_ORDR , A.MENU_GUBN , A.MENU_CSS , CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF LEAF FROM ( SELECT * FROM POLARBEAR.TB_SYSMNUXM WHERE MENU_CD IN ( SELECT MENU_CD FROM POLARBEAR.TB_SYSGMNXM WHERE GROUP_CD IN (SELECT GROUP_CD FROM POLARBEAR.TB_SYSGUSXM WHERE MEMB_ID = #{MEMB_ID}) ) ) A CONNECT BY PRIOR MENU_CD = UPPER_MENU_CD START WITH UPPER_MENU_CD IS NULL ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.SORT_ORDR, A.MENU_CD
SELECT ATFL_ID, ATFL_SEQ, STFL_PATH, STFL_NAME, ORFL_NAME, FILE_EXT, FILE_SIZE, FILEPATH_FLAG FROM POLARBEAR.TB_COATFLXD WHERE ATFL_ID = #{ATFL_ID} AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY ATFL_SEQ
SELECT OPTM_CODE , OPTD_CODE , OPTDCD_NAME , SORT_ORDR , USE_YN , OPT_EXPN , REGP_ID , REG_DTM , MODP_ID , MOD_DTM FROM POLARBEAR.TB_OPTCODXD WHERE OPTM_CODE = #{OPTM_CODE} ORDER BY SORT_ORDR

SELECT C.GROUP_CD , A.MEMB_ID , A.SUPMEM_APST FROM POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM A LEFT OUTER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_SPINFOXM B ON A.SUPR_ID = B.SUPR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_SYSGUSXM C ON A.MEMB_ID = C.MEMB_ID WHERE A.MEMB_ID = #{MEMB_ID} AND A.MEMB_GUBN IN ('MEMB_GUBN_03','MEMB_GUBN_04') AND DECODE(A.MEMB_GUBN,'MEMB_GUBN_03','Y',B.USE_YN) ='Y' AND A.SUPMEM_APST ='SUPMEM_APST_03'
